Key Match Events: The match ended in a hard-fought, often physical, goalless draw.
Pre-Game Insights: A 58,000-plus crowd turned out at the Salt Lake Stadium, Kolkata, to watch Sunil Chhetri one last time.
Post-Match Reflections: Chettri's passion for the game, not to speak of the discipline and commitment which helped him sustain his international career, will remain a shining example to aspiring footballers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 58,000-strong Kolkata crowd doffed its hat to the 'captain, leader, legend' one last time.
Others: Sunil Chhetri's 94 international goals from 150 matches leaves him in 'only' third place among the top international goal-getters in active football â€” after the mighty CR7 and Leo Messi.
